title: Microsoft is quadrupling its AI and cloud investment in Spain
description:
Microsoft has announced plans to significantly boost its investment in AI and cloud infrastructure in Spain, with a commitment to quadruple its spending during 2024-2025 to reach $2.1 billion. This substantial increase marks the largest investment by Microsoft in Spain since its establishment in the country 37 years ago. The tech giant is set to... Read more »

The post Microsoft is quadrupling its AI and cloud investment in Spain appeared first on AI News.
